original_text: Carmi's son was Achar. Achar caused a lot of trouble for Israel. He took for himself things that belonged to God.
korean_text: 갈미의 아들은 아갈이니 그는 진멸시킬 물건을 범하여 이스라엘을 괴롭힌 자이며

sentences.original_text: Achar caused a lot of trouble for Israel
He took for himself things that belonged to God
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님에게 속한 것들을 자신을 위해 가져왔다
